description:
The revolutionary file search tool for Windows.

Listary is a revolutionary search utility for Windows that makes finding your files and launching apps blazing fast, for casual and power users alike.
Hi everyone! 🎉 The new Listary 6.3.2.88 is here with improved performance and fixes. Update now and check it out!
- Discussions: https://discussion.listary.com/t/v6-3-2-88-stable-version-released-major-custom-index-and-stability-enhancements/9405/1
- 中文更新日志及讨论：https://discussion.listary.com/t/v6-3-2-88/9404/1
Main Updates​
- New settings: Double-clicking Ctrl again in the launcher can be customized to either hide the launcher or switch to the file search window.
- New: Added setting in Options > Hotkeys > Show Listary. Double-clicking Ctrl again in the launcher can now hide it or switch to file search.

- New: Added setting in Options > General > Use Software Render (default off). Intel integrated graphics users with memory issues can enable this option.

Other Updates​
- Fixed: Resolved an issue where custom folder indexes pointing directly to drive roots (e.g., E:) could not be automatically monitored for updates.
- Fixed: Addressed a rare crash that occurred when search queries contained only diacritical characters.
- Fixed: Resolved a crash that could occur when using IME input immediately after opening the launcher.
- Fixed: Resolved machine code changes causing extra activation count usage.
- Fixed: Addressed an issue where mapped network drives might not be indexed.
- Fixed: Resolved an issue where custom indexing failed to index some files in certain scenarios.
- Fixed: Addressed a crash in the search engine that occurred when canceling a foreground search under specific conditions.
- Improved: Adopted WPF software rendering to enhance compatibility and prevent memory leaks caused by driver issues with some Intel integrated graphics cards.
- Improved: Implemented periodic retry for custom index target folders that are inaccessible.
